sources.description: 5 Steps to Danger is a 1957 American film noir crime film directed, produced, and coâ€“written by Henry S. Kesler . It stars Ruth Roman and Sterling Hayden , with a cast that also included Werner Klemperer , Richard Gaines , Charles Davis , Jeanne Cooper , and Peter Hansen . 5 Steps to Danger was based on the novel The Steel Mirror by Donald Hamilton .
